alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:17PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pinal County through 200 PM MST... At 117 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Chui-Chu, or 23 miles southwest of Casa Grande. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Komelik, Kohatk and Jack Rabbit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
